RBH-84
COPY
FEDERAL COMMUNICATIONS COMMISSION
W&8biQgtou ^5j DeC o
April 8* 1949
MTo Richard B, Hull, President
National Assn* of Educational Broadcasters
KOI, Iowa State College
Ames, Iowa
Dear Mr, Hulls
Thank you very much for your letter of April
4 and the copy of your March NAEB News Letter*
1 want to wish you luck in your efforts to
open a Washington office and your efforts in general
to promote educational broadcesting*
As you probably know, I am going to speak
at the Institute for Education by Radio on Thursday
night. May 55 end I will look forward to seeing you
there «
Sincerely yours,
/»/ WAYNE COY
Chairman
